entry.title: (No Title) 孔子5.html
entry.content:
君子成人之美，不成人之恶，小人反是。

The superior man seeks to perfect the admirable qualities of men, and does not seek to perfect their bad qualities.The mean man does the opposite of this.

entry.title: (No Title) 孔子5.html
entry.content:
性相近也，习相远也。

By nature, men are nearly alike; by practice, they get to be wide apart.

entry.title: (No Title) 孔子6.html
entry.content:
过而不改，是谓过矣。

Not to mend the fault one has made is to err indeed.

entry.title: (No Title) 孔子6.html
entry.content:
言必信，行必果。

Keep what you say and carry out what you do.

entry.title: (No Title) 孔子6.html
entry.content:
逝者如斯夫，不舍昼夜。

It passes on just like this, not ceasing day or night!

entry.title: (No Title) 孔子6.html
entry.content:
人无远虑，必有近忧。

If a man takes no thought about what is distant, he will find sorrow near at hand.
